DOC.brief_summary: To determine if ZD6474 a new investigational drug, is effective in treating Non Small Lung Cancer and if so, how it compares with another type of anti cancer therapy chemotherapy, Erlotinib
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Trial Comparing ZD6474 With Erlotinib in NSCLC After Failure of at Least One Prior Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Confirmed locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC Failure of at least one but not more than two prior chemotherapy regimens Prior treatment with erlotinib (Tarceva), gefitinib (IRESSA), sunitinib (Sutent), sorafenib (Nexavar) Chemotherapy or other type of anti cancer therapy within 4 weeks of study start
